head.title: Westchester Venture Group Offers Entrepreneurs Advice

hedline.hl1: Westchester Venture Group Offers Entrepreneurs Advice

abstract.p: Westchester Venture Group plans meeting at which entrepreneurs will be given advice on preparing business plan (S)

block.p: Entrepreneurs can get advice on preparing a business plan at a meeting of the Westchester Venture Group on Wednesday from 7 to 9:30 a.m. at the Rye Town Hilton.
Speakers will talk about writing a business plan, obtaining financing and the fundamentals of intellectual property.
Entrepreneurs can get advice on preparing a business plan at a meeting of the Westchester Venture Group on Wednesday from 7 to 9:30 a.m. at the Rye Town Hilton.
Speakers will talk about writing a business plan, obtaining financing and the fundamentals of intellectual property.
The group is a nonprofit organization that tries to promote business growth in the county by providing a network of resources for entrepreneurs.
To register, call (914) 946-9141 or visit the organization's Web site at www.westchesterventuregrp.com.
